title: nAttikar naghaiyArO
sahitya:
nAttikar naghaiyArO unnai nambi irukkum ennai vambu sheidAl innum


anupallavi

  sAttirattai koLutti samayamgaLaip-pazhittE sAmiyillai ennum kAmigaLAghiya


caraNam    ellAm un sheyal enrE eNNinEn en idayattilE pUjai paNNiNEn
tollaiyellAm porutta puNNinEn Atma sutantaram pera unnai naNNinEn ayyA
gati nI mati nI vidhi nI pati nIyE kaNNu nI kATSi nI karuttu nI enum ennai
